events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit me and I don't want to keep it.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with product fit and a wish to return.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket returned by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging for the refund?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging.
We have processed your refund request. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the prepaid label, that makes returning the jacket very easy.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be refunded within 5 business days.
Checking back to ensure you received the return label and to confirm if you need any additional support with your refund.
Since the refund has been processed successfully, we are closing your case. Thank you for shopping with us; we hope to serve you again.
